sentence: Republican Arizona Senate candidate Blake Masters, Democratic Wisconsin Senate candidate Tom Nelson and Pennsylvania Democrat John Fetterman recently announced support for a ban.
title: What’s the plan, Chuck?

title: Biden touts infrastructure importance in Pittsburgh visit after bridge collapse

sentence: Locked in a tight nominating race with the Northeastern state’s progressive lieutenant governor, John Fetterman, the moderate Lamb has drawn comparisons to Manchin, a conservative Democratic Senator from neighboring West Virginia who has routinely acted as a roadblock to Democratic priorities in Congress.
author: Jarrett Renshaw
title: Pennsylvania's moderate Democrat Lamb distances himself from Manchin

sentence: Governor John Fetterman, a progressive U.S. Senate candidate, voiced support Friday for permanently boosting the Child Tax Credit after research showed that Congress' failure to extend the enhanced benefit caused child poverty to spike in January.
author: Jake Johnson
title: Fetterman Calls for Permanent Expansion of Enhanced Child Tax Credit
